1102940.name: Mogh
1102940.description: Mogh is a fast-paced arcade-style game. The players have an arsenal of magical projectiles and shield at their disposal to fend off hordes of enemies. The game is an introduction to a VR version that will follow soon after, and the early release version is focused on getting as much feedback as possible. All the feedbacks will eventually help us to understand the taste of the gamers, and give us a foundation to build upon.
